title: Among the Creationists c2012 EPUB Rosenhouse
description:
Among the Creationists: Dispatches from the Anti-Evolutionist Front Line (c2012) by Jason Rosenhouse.

eBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://global.oup.com/academic/product/among-the-creationists-9780199744633" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://global.oup.com/academic/product/among-the-creationists-9780199744633</a>

CONTENTS:

PART ONE: Vignettes
-1 Studies in Insularity
-2 Showdown at Subway
-3 The Prospects for Agreeable Disagreements
-4 How I Got Here
-5 My Problems with Religion
PART TWO: The Creation Mega-Conference, Lynchburg, VA, June 2005
-6 An Introduction to Evolution
-7 An Introduction to Creationism
-8 Literalism and Other Canards
-9 Browsing the Bookstore
-10 The Best Evidence That God Created
-11 Fossils, Human and Otherwise
-12 On Information
-13 Movies and Television
PART THREE: Darwin and Design, Knoxville, TN, March 2007
-14 The Marginality of Genesis 1
-15 Intelligent Design vs. Young-Earth Creationism
-16 Rhetorical Legerdemain
-17 Conversion Stories
-18 On Religious Experience
-19 Creation as Fishtank
-20 Methodological Naturalism
-21 Irreducible Complexity
PART FOUR: Visiting the Creation Museum, Petersburg, KY, Summer 2010
-22 Creation Cinema
-23 Creation and Corruption
-24 Groaning under the Curse
-25 From Catastrophe to Consummation
-26 What Does Genesis Mean?
-27 Theological Phlogiston
-28 Why I Love Being Jewish
PART FIVE: The Sixth International Conference on Creationism, Pittsburgh, PA, August 2008
-29 Building the Creation Model
-30 Inevitable Humans?
-31 Unpleasantness
-32 Conversations in Bookstores
-33 Is the Earth at the Center of the Universe?
-34 Things I Learned at the Banquet
EPILOGUE: The Ninth North American Paleontological Convention, Cincinnati, OH, June 2009
Notes
Bibliography

FILE INFO: ToC, EPUB format. Tested in Calibre's ebook viewer and Adobe Digital Editions.


"Evolutionists don't understand real science."  - Ken Ham, founder and curator of the Creation Museum, and president of Answers in Genesis.

Moderator: "What, if anything, would cause you to change your mind?"
Bill Nye: "Evidence."
Ken Ham: "Nothing."
- From a debate betweeen Bill Nye (engineer and science educator) and Ken Ham to answer "Is Creation A Viable Model of Origins?" held at the Creation Museum (KY), Feb 4, 2014.
